t: Amazon.com: Original: CDs & Vinyl
s: Last time I checked Johnny Rivers has still not been inducted into the Rock 'n Roll Hall of Fame. I am not sure that this is the right way to go about it, but Rivers and his fans have been aggresively campaigning to correct this oversight. Is he a Hall of Famer? If you have any doubts just listen to this CD...
